text:
Announcer: Just when
it seemed all hope was lost,
Ladybug enters the field.
You want to play soccer?

How about battling it out
on an equal playing field?

Ah, Ladybug. Nothing would make
me happier than crushing you

and your team
of ridiculous losers.
No need for a whole team.

It's just Cat Noir and me
against your clones.

We'll be so awesome that
you won't even see the ball.

We're going to win and
de-akumatize you in no time.
The akuma is the trophy
and trophies are for winners,
not losers.
( Ladybug laughs )
Nice scare tactics,
but it's not going to work.

Cat Noir and I
are the best at soccer.

I don't know a thing
about soccer, milady.

Maybe it's better to call
the real team?
Oh, well, uh...

Cat Noir will tend
the goals while I go get

- the rest of our team.
- ( Penalty laughing )

I guess you're not that
confident after all, Ladybug.

Let's see what you're made of,
kitty cat.

Announcer:
From the look on his face,

not champion material,
I'm afraid.
Sabrina Raincomprix,

here is the Miraculous
of the Dog,
which grants the power to fetch

and return whatever
your ball has touched.

I'm sorry,
but I can't do that to Chloé.

That's not Chloé out there.
It's Penalteam.
Don't you want to set her free?

If it's to save Chloé,
then yes.
Besides, I love soccer.

Hi, I'm Barkk,
and I'm your kwami.

Ladybug, I'm really
not that good at soccer.

- I--
- You're too hard on yourself.

You're more talented
than you realize.
Hi, I'm Orikko. Let's play!

It's just,
I'm flattered, Ladybug,

but I don't feel comfortable
being on a team.

Really? Aren't you the one
who's teamed up with a writer
to create those Ladybug comics?

You will use it
for the greater good

and return it to me
once the job is done.
Can I trust you?
Hi, I'm your kwami Ziggy.
Ladybug: Can I trust you?

Hi, I'm Stompp. Let's add
some muscle to this game.

What if I hurt someone
using my superpowers?
It's good to be careful, Ivan,

but remember,
you'll be on a team

of superheroes
facing supervillains.
No one can be hurt.

Announcer: Left on his own,
Cat Noir seems exhausted.

Pentalteam's cannonballs
have turned

the valiant feline
into cat food.

It's not sport anymore.
It's animal abuse.

Ladybug: You didn't do
so badly, kitty cat.

Announcer:
Ladybug is back!

Here's the group selected
for this decisive match.

Ladybug remains faithful
in her classical lineup--
Carapace, Pegasus,

Polymouse, King Monkey,
Purple Tigress,

Pigella, Vesperia,
Viperion, and Ryuko.

But also four new recruits
whose names I don't know.

- Miss Hound.
- Rooster Bold.

- Caprikid
- Minotaurox.
Blah, blah, blah, blah.

Okay, losers,
are you done yet?

You got a plan
for getting our paws
on the akumatized object?

That'll be our trophy
when we win.

- What if we don't?
- Come on.

I know the secrets
of this game.

Let's finish this soccer game
once and for all.

Announcer: And so begins
the battle of the century

between Pentalteam
and the Miraculous team.

- Aah!
- Impossible!
Injustice! Treason!

- Foul!
- Not according to my rules.

Careful, don't let her
touch you with her cleats.

Penalty passes to Penalty
who passes to Penalty.

What a show
of incredible coordination,

as if they were one,
which seems to be the case.
Pegasus lets Penalty pass.

Ladybug's team
seems thrown off course.
